body_html:
FWIW, the hang is not happening on my MBP (no CUDA):

  • ./test_jit throws an unexpected exception (with message CUDAFloatType is not enabled) and quits (without hanging)
  • injecting an unexpected exception in a CPU test and running ./test_jit [cpu] also quits without hanging

I'll need to try on my linux box at work.
body_text:
FWIW, the hang is not happening on my MBP (no CUDA):

./test_jit throws an unexpected exception (with message CUDAFloatType is not enabled) and quits (without hanging)
injecting an unexpected exception in a CPU test and running ./test_jit [cpu] also quits without hanging

I'll need to try on my linux box at work.
body:
FWIW, the hang is not happening on my MBP (no CUDA):
* `./test_jit` throws an unexpected exception (with message `CUDAFloatType is not enabled`) and quits (without hanging)
* injecting an unexpected exception in a CPU test and running `./test_jit [cpu]` also quits without hanging

I'll need to try on my linux box at work.
